name: Snap-Pad
tagline: The One Time Pad It's Okay To Like
body:
### It's a secret!

Well, it's not a secret. But it's not done yet! This is a place holder, to hold the places.

### When will it be done?

* Code is almost done. Some use cases need to be firmed up, and additional RNG verification should be done, but it's close.
* v2 prototypes are out to OSH Park for production. [Track status.](http://oshpark.com/orders/8w8O7MLV)
* I'm out of town the first week of March, so best guess is March 15.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
